what: Helps you Choose a Great Name for your (Future) Dog
title: Helps you Choose a Great Name for your (Future) Dog
text: goal dognamefinder find dognames. package created part DiMES January 29th Workshop creating R packages. slides workshop, see .

title: Helps you Choose a Great Name for your (Future) Dog
text: can install development version dimes2026 like :

title: Helps you Choose a Great Name for your (Future) Dog
text: basic example shows solve common problem:
code: library(dimes2026) ## basic example code greet("all Dogs out there") #> [1] "Hello, all Dogs out there" find_dogname(breed = "Labrador") #> [1] "Bailey" "Max"    "Bella"

what: Find a dog name based on selected attributes — find_dogname
title: Find a dog name based on selected attributes — find_dogname
text: Randomly samples dog name dogs dataset, optionally conditioning gender, breed, size, character. exact match exists, constraints relaxed stepwise ensure valid result.

title: Find a dog name based on selected attributes — find_dogname
code: find_dogname(gender = NULL, breed = NULL, size = NULL, character = NULL)

title: Find a dog name based on selected attributes — find_dogname
text: gender Character string specifying dog's gender. NULL default, picks random gender name. breed Character string specifying dog's breed.  NULL default, picks random breed. name. size Character string specifying dog's size category. character Character string specifying dog's character trait.

title: Find a dog name based on selected attributes — find_dogname
text: single character string containing dog name.

title: Find a dog name based on selected attributes — find_dogname
code: # find a female and Pug name find_dogname(gender = "female", breed = "Pug") #> Error in sample.int(length(x), size, replace, prob): cannot take a sample larger than the population when 'replace = FALSE' find_dogname(size = "chonker", character = "aggressive") #> Error in sample.int(length(x), size, replace, prob): cannot take a sample larger than the population when 'replace = FALSE' find_dogname() #> [1] "Shadow" "Molly"  "Sadie"

title: Pipe operator — %>%
text: lhs value magrittr placeholder. rhs function call using magrittr semantics.
